Why: Peta is urging consumers to boycott canned coconut milk from Thailand. field 14: Peta told Ethical Consumer in an email in November 2023 that, "Since the Thai coconut industry continues to lie, the best thing consumers can do to help the monkeys it abuses is to avoid canned coconut milk from Thailand."
